attributes.action: Cut MP's expenses, wages & benefits instead of hiking taxes and cutting spending
attributes.additional_details:
George Osborne cut his own tax rate, he helped wealthy people's pockets each month. Houses are being claimed on expenses, they have their food shopping being brough for them and their salaries are:

George Osborne = £134,565
David Cameron = £143,462
Nigel Farage = £109,000
Borris Johnson = £121,000

All while in July 2015 it was announced that all MPs' salaries are to rise from £67060 to £74000 AND CLAIMING EXPENSES ON TOP OF THIS!! And for what?! To decide what's best for us!! Please share!
attributes.background:
Why should George Osbourne announce tax hikes and spending cuts when
he cut his own tax rate in Budget change - despite claiming he wouldn't profit from it but saving him £200 a month! MP's benefits include million pound houses, food paid for on expenses and tax dodging!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
